• **Currencies**: The major FX pairs remained within their established ranges. The EUR/USD pair closed at 1.1035, up 0.1% from the previous day, while the USD/JPY pair closed at 133.45, down 0.1% from the previous day.
• **Cryptocurrencies**: The crypto market was relatively calm, with no major breaches of the alert threshold. Bitcoin (BTC) closed at $43,500, up 0.3% from the previous day, while Ethereum (ETH) closed at $2,800, down 0.2% from the previous day.
